Hi,
      I am trying to setup heritrix in Eclipse on my linux box.
The instructions on wiki seem to be ... inadequate and incorrect
in few places.
Specifically the section telling about setting program arguments
seem to be incomplete (-w [webui war localtion] is required)
and incorrect (-h is for help).

After following the instructions when I try to start heritrix in dev mode
I get the following error.

[Console Logs]
heritrix.development mode
